Responses.NAM1 - Response Text: Yes, you have found more women who will move to Indarys Manor. Our settlement will grow and prosper.
You have found women who will move here to Indarys Manor. I will tell the others.
You have found women who will move here to Indarys Manor. I will tell the others.
I am sure there are many single women in Ald'ruhn who would move here. You could ask there.
If you cannot find any wives, you could buy slaves in Tel Aruhn and bring them here. Many would prefer marriage over slavery.
Yes, you were right. These men need wives. Have you seen how they dress? Perhaps I will stay here a few days.
I have some things to do here in town, but I will come visit Indarys Manor as soon as I can.
Wait. If I understand you, you're saying that this "Indarys Manor" has a dozen eligible men. And there are only a few women there.
And you want me to move there to find a husband, right?
I understand what you're asking, and I'm not offended. But I'm not sure I should leave Ald'ruhn.
What? Why would I leave here with a complete stranger to marry a man I've never met?
I am glad to be here in Indarys Manor with so many men to choose from.
Yes, I may find a husband here, or I may return to High Rock. Who can say?
Yes, I have not chosen my husband yet, but I think I will settle down here at Indarys Manor.
You've convinced me, outlander. I'm moving to Indarys Manor.
Okay. I might as well try looking around Indarys Manor. There certainly aren't any real men around here.
I must admit I'm interested in you offer. But not quite interested enough to accept.
Do you think I'd marry just anyone?
I will send the next slaves we get to your manor. I am sure they will be happier as wives than slaves.
Yes, I know. You're the lord of Indarys Manor. You said you needed wives there?
Why are you asking me? I'm not looking for a husband.
I am spoken for, but if you have the idea I think you have, you should speak with Galyn Arvel in Ald Velothi.
Yes, I will send the slaves to you as soon as I find them. I will keep my word, outlander.
I do not have any slaves right now that would be suitable as wives...
But for 2000 drakes, I could purchase two and send them to your manor. Is this acceptable?
As I said, I will ask my girls, but I cannot promise anything.
I am sorry if you have the wrong impression. My girls are dancers, nothing more.
Have you asked Aryni Orethi? Many have, but she has refused them all.
Try asking Fathusa Girethi at the Ald Skar Inn.
There's only one place in town for that, outlander, Desele's House of Earthly Delights.
Savile Imayn is the only one here who might be able to find you a wife.
She runs the slave market on the northwest side of the tower.
